channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Uneven slabs caused me to fall over outside of greggs, 26th May
item.description:
Along the pavement by card factory, tanning shop and greggs. Not happy at all as I am currently suffering with my back as it is and this situation has not helped at all.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78, Edinburgh Place, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole outside building site, 26th May
item.description:
I drove down this road yesterday (saturday 25th may) and outside the site where platform are building homes there is a massive pothole or sunken drain that felt like i had hit a brick wall as my tyre sank into it at 50mph. It needs levelling out because that would cause a cyclist to fly over the handlebars and is dangerous to motorcyclists as well. I tried to avoid it but its in the middle of the lane and i was unable to go around it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed hump triangles need repainting please, 25th May
item.description:
Speed hump triangles need repainting please, on ped crossing outside Berkhamstead school, Pittville. Towards Pittville Circus. The tree canopy adds to the shade obscuring the now unmarked speed hump (which is quite a high speed hump too !) - please don't unnecessarily cut down the tree foliage as we all need the oxygen !!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pittville Circus Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
